title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password according to their role.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username/email and password for a User role
Click login button
Check that login is successful and user dashboard is displayed appropriate to role

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with an incorrect username or password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username/email or wrong password
Click login button
Check that login fails and an error message is shown

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that a user can reset their password successfully through the password recovery process.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page
Enter registered email address
Submit password reset request
Verify receipt of password reset email or link
Follow reset link and enter a new valid password
Verify password is updated and user can log in with new password

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that users with different roles (User, Admin, Super Admin) have access only to their allowed features and pages.

steps.description: Login as User role
Verify access to user task management and profile but no admin dashboard access
Logout and login as Admin role
Verify access to admin dashboard and user management but no Super Admin-only features
Logout and login as Super Admin role
Verify access to all administrative features including management and analytics

title: Create New Task Successfully
description: Verify that a user can create a new task with required fields including category and deadline.

steps.description: Navigate to task creation interface
Fill in task title, description, select category, status, and set a deadline
Submit the new task form
Verify that the new task appears in the task list with correct information

title: Edit Existing Task
description: Verify that a user can update details of an existing task and changes are saved correctly.

steps.description: Locate an existing task in the task list
Open task details and modify title, category, status, or deadline
Save changes
Verify that task details are updated accordingly in the list

title: Delete Task
description: Verify that a user can delete a task and it is removed from the task list.

steps.description: Select a task to delete
Perform delete action and confirm deletion
Verify that the task no longer appears in the task list

title: Drag and Drop Task Reordering
description: Verify that tasks can be reordered via drag-and-drop in the task list and order is persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to task list
Drag a task from one position to another
Verify that the task order updates in UI and persists after page reload

title: Task Deadline Notification Trigger
description: Validate that users receive timely notifications for tasks nearing their deadlines.

steps.description: Create or identify a task with a deadline approaching soon
Verify receipt of push or in-app notification about the upcoming deadline

title: Create and Manage Academic Routine
description: Verify users can create, view, update, and delete daily routine schedules.

steps.description: Navigate to routine management page
Create a new routine with title, time, and description
Verify the new routine is listed
Edit the routine details
Check that updates are saved and displayed correctly
Delete the routine
Verify that the routine is removed from the list

title: View Course Information
description: Verify that users can access detailed course information and related academic content.

steps.description: Navigate to courses section
Select a specific course
Verify that course details such as schedule, instructor, and description are displayed

title: Access Lecture Slides
description: Verify that users can access and view lecture slides for enrolled courses.

steps.description: Navigate to lecture slides section
Select lecture slides for a given course or date
Verify that slides display correctly in the viewer component

title: Global Search Functionality with Filters
description: Validate that the search supports querying tasks, routines, and academic content with various filters and returns accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to global search page
Enter a keyword relevant to existing task or academic material
Apply filters such as category, status, and date range
Execute search
Verify that search results correctly match keyword and filters

title: Admin User Management Operations
description: Verify admins can add, edit, and disable user accounts via the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to user management section
Add a new user with role and profile details
Verify the new user appears in the user list
Edit an existing user’s information or role
Verify updates are reflected
Disable a user account
Verify the user is disabled and cannot log in

title: Admin Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Verify that analytics visualizations accurately reflect system data such as user activity and task completion statistics.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to analytics dashboard
Verify that charts and reports accurately display user and task metrics based on system data

title: Offline Mode Data Accessibility
description: Ensure that users can access cached tasks, routines, and academic information while offline.

steps.description: Load application and cache some tasks, routines, and academic content
Simulate offline mode by disabling network connection
Verify access to previously cached data with full functionality

title: Responsive UI Behavior on Different Devices
description: Validate that the UI components render and behave correctly on various screen sizes including desktop and Android phone.

steps.description: Open application on desktop browser with various window sizes
Verify layout adapts correctly with no content overlap or loss
Open application on Android device
Verify UI elements are responsive and usable with touch input

title: Data Security Enforcement via Row Level Security
description: Verify that Row Level Security policies correctly prevent unauthorized data access according to user roles.

steps.description: Login as regular User
Attempt to access another user’s tasks, routines, or profile data via APIs or UI
Verify that access is denied or data is not visible
Login as Admin and perform similar access tests
Verify that admins cannot access Super Admin only data or functions

title: Profile Update and Persistence
description: Verify that users can update their profile information and changes persist after logout and login.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to profile page
Update profile fields like display name, email (if allowed), or preferences
Save changes
Verify updates are reflected immediately
Logout and login again
Verify profile changes persist

title: Filtering Task List by Category and Status
description: Verify users can filter tasks based on categories and status and the filtered results are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to task list page
Apply category filter (e.g., Homework)
Verify task list shows only tasks in selected category
Apply status filter (e.g., Completed)
Verify task list updates accordingly to show only tasks matching both filters
